newsitem.title: USA: Fidelity's Spartan brokerage arm offers flat fee.
newsitem.headline: Fidelity's Spartan brokerage arm offers flat fee.

text.p: Fidelity Investments said that Spartan Brokerage Services, the company's deep discount arm, will offer a flat commission rate of $25 for active traders who trade stocks online.
Active traders will pay a flat fee of $25 for up to 1,000 shares and trades of from 1,001 to 4,999 shares will cost $25 plus $0.03 for each share over 1,000.
For stocks trading below $1, traders will pay three percent of principal with a minimum commission of $25.
The prices are exclusive to customers who trade at least 36 times per year and maintain a minimum balance of $20,000.
